articles.title: Indian military exits from Maldives at President Mohamed Muizzu's request | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Indian troops withdrew from Maldives at the request of President Muizzu, who aims to strengthen ties with China. Tensions have risen between India and Maldives since Muizzu took office, leading to a shift in alliances and agreements with China.
